content: @Luke McCormick I like your proposition, and it is something I have been talking about and trying to implement myself (in my spare time).
I also took some time in the last week to set up a local site with all the current contrib themes with the idea of seeing what was broken and submit PRs against them, again in my spare time.

@Luke McCormick - here is my spreadsheet
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/15Cmp7jRsA_rpNXYPKsE1fNRGwjlu-m7rlKzIoirRJJI/edit#gid=0

Backdrop CMS Themes
Existing Backdrop Themes If this is helpful, please feel free to update it. The information is dated.,Quick/Simple Screenshot,First Release,Latest Released 7/9/2019,Downloads 7/9/2019,Active 7/9/2019,Settings (any available)?,Color Module Support,LESS or SASS Support,Current Maintainer,Origin <...
